directions: Mix eggs, mayonnaise, and seasoned salt together in a bowl; spoon evenly among 4 pint jars. Layer pickles, tuna, and arugula on top of mayonnaise mixture. Cover tightly with lid and refrigerate.
ingredients: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna packed in water, drained
4 1-pint canning jars with lids and rings
title: Mason Jar Egg and Tuna Salad
